# Autonomica
# The directory and discovery layer for the Agent Web.

> site_name: Autonomica
> description: The directory, specification, and signal feed for the Agent Web — where AI agents find, evaluate, and pay for structured content.
> url: https://autonomi.ca

# Documents
> doc: /agent/docs/manifesto.md  — The Agent Web thesis. Why the internet is restructuring around AI agent consumption.
> doc: /agent/docs/spec.md  — Technical specification for agent-facing content architecture.
> doc: /agent/docs/pricing-guide.md  — How to price agent-facing content using HTTP 402.
> doc: /agent/docs/security.md  — The Instruction Authority Model for agent-safe publishing.
> doc: /agent/docs/trust.md  — Trust tiers and verification for agent-ready sites.

# Endpoints
> index: /agent/index.json
> pricing: /agent/pricing.json
> changelog: /agent/changelog.json

# Signals
> feed: /signals  — Continuously updated intelligence from the agent commerce ecosystem.

# Tools
> tool: /generate  — Generate agent-facing file structure for any site.
> tool: /validate  — Validate llms.txt and index.json for spec compliance.
> tool: /estimate  — Estimate token count and revenue for agent-facing content.
> tool: /inspect  — Check any domain for agent-readiness.

# Directory
> directory: /directory  — Browse the live registry of agent-ready sites.
> api: /api/probe  — POST: Probe a domain for agent-readiness.
> api: /api/search  — GET: Search directory by topic.
